00077 void sbwSignatureBoolean::write(DataBlockWriter writer, va_list &ap)
00078 {
00079         SBWBoolean arg = va_arg(ap, SBWBoolean);
00080         bool x = (arg != 0) ;
00081 
00082         writer << x ;
00083 }

00106 void sbwSignatureBoolean::write1DArray(DataBlockWriter writer, Integer size, va_list &ap)
00107 {
00108         SBWBoolean *arg = va_arg(ap, SBWBoolean *);
00109         bool *array = new bool[size];
00110         int i = 0 ;
00111 
00112         while (i != size)
00113         {
00114                 array[i] = (arg[i] != 0) ;
00115                 i++ ;
00116         }
00117 
00118         writer.add(size, array);
00119         delete array;
00120 }

00130 void sbwSignatureBoolean::read1DArray(DataBlockReader reader, Integer &size, va_list &ap)
00131 {
00132         SBWBoolean **result = va_arg(ap, SBWBoolean **);
00133         bool *array ;
00134 
00135         reader.get(size, array);
00136         *result = (SBWBoolean *)calloc(size, sizeof(SBWBoolean));
00137 
00138         int i = 0 ;
00139 
00140         while (i != size)
00141         {
00142                 (*result)[i] = array[i] ;
00143                 i++ ;
00144         }
00145 
00146         delete array ;
00147 }

00157 void sbwSignatureBoolean::write2DArray(DataBlockWriter writer, Integer xSize, Integer ySize, va_list &ap)
00158 {
00159         SBWBoolean **arg = va_arg(ap, SBWBoolean **);
00160         bool **array = new bool *[xSize];
00161         int x = 0 ;
00162 
00163         while (x != xSize)
00164         {
00165                 array[x] = new bool[ySize];
00166 
00167                 int y = 0 ;
00168 
00169                 while (y != ySize)
00170                 {
00171                         array[x][y] = (arg[x][y] != 0);
00172                         y++ ;
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 x++ ;
00176         }
00177 
00178         writer.add(xSize, ySize, array);
00179         sbwDataBlockReader::free2DArray(xSize, array);
00180 }

00192 {
00193         SBWBoolean ***result = va_arg(ap, SBWBoolean ***);
00194         bool **array ;
00195 
00196         reader.get(xSize, ySize, array);
00197 
00198         *result = (SBWBoolean **)calloc(xSize, sizeof(SBWBoolean *));
00199         int x = 0 ;
00200 
00201         while (x != xSize)
00202         {
00203                 (*result)[x] = (SBWBoolean *)calloc(ySize, sizeof(SBWBoolean));
00204 
00205                 int y = 0 ;
00206 
00207                 while (y != ySize)
00208                 {
00209                         (*result)[x][y] = array[x][y];
00210                         y++ ;
00211                 }
00212 
00213                 x++ ;
00214         }
00215 
00216         sbwDataBlockReader::free2DArray(xSize, array);
00217 }
